1.title: Not having the knowledge we need, test an idea whose time has come

3.title: The dark side of our behaviour

5.title: A malfunctioning survival mechanism
5.description: We built up a tolerance towards our mistakes and now derives pleasure from them. We cant trust our instincts anymore.

6.title: Fear
6.description: Fear removes our ability to see things clearly. And seeing things clearly is a prerequisite to solving any problem.

9.title: The neocortex & the reptilian brain
9.description: Reptilian brain gets addicted to anything thats pleasurable

10.title: Shooting inside the tent
10.description: Lack of continuity among those who knows they are making mistakes

11.title: Lost our natural instincts
11.description: Other animals instincts tells them the right thing to do. We need to use our brains until our problems are solved. Then our feedback system will tell us what to do.

12.title: A lack of knowledge of the cleansing reactions
12.description: Often when we do the right things we think we are doing the wrong things because we are experiencing a negative effect.

18.1.1.title: Unwillingness to admit false knowledge in place of the knowledge we need.

18.1.3.title: Unwillingness to admit that most of our problems are within our control.

18.5.title: Unwillingness to apply what we know

31.title: freedom of things outside of our control

35.title: subsequent causes
35.description: Needs gotten by bad behaviour. E.g. bad lungs from smoking.
